text: The city police on Tuesday arrested a woman, Jothika, on charges of providing shelter to the accused who were involved in hurling country-made bomb outside the court premises here on February 22. Of the total 20 accused in the case, nine surrendered in the court while the police arrested eight persons. The police arrested the woman, who was said to have provided shelter to the accused after the incident. She was produced in the court and lodged in prison.
title: Woman arrested
